dependencies: Python standard library: json, logging, os (lambda_function.py)
System packages installed in image: gnupg, curl, ca-certificates (Dockerfile)
Litecoin binaries downloaded/verified at build time (Dockerfile: LITECOIN_VERSION=0.21.3, platform aarch64-linux-gnu)
deployment_relevant_files: GitHub Actions workflow for Docker build/push (/ai-gen-from-code-to-iac/workspace/832779198/.github/workflows/dockerfile-ci.yml)
architectural_resources: Containerized application/image: Litecoin node daemon (litecoind) built via Dockerfile; exposes ports 9332/9333
CI/CD: GitHub Actions workflow that builds and pushes image to Docker Hub (requires DOCKERHUB_USERNAME var and DOCKERHUB_TOKEN secret)
AWS S3 bucket (implied by lambda_function.py S3 event handling and README instructions about source/ and destination/ prefixes)
AWS Lambda function (lambda_function.py) triggered by S3 ObjectCreated events; copies object from source/ to destination/ and deletes original
IAM permissions for Lambda to s3:CopyObject and s3:DeleteObject on the bucket (implied by boto3 operations)
(From README) Terraform-managed AWS infrastructure is intended, including an S3 module at terraform/modules/s3-bucket, but no *.tf files were found in this repository snapshot
